thread.title: Amber Gilliam
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Amber Gilliam

author: Amber Gilliam
title: Amber Gilliam
text: My husband and I needed a new mattress. We went into the store and were helped immediately to find the perfect one. The best part is when we were told that it could be delivered the next morning...for free! The delivery guys were great and even took care of our old mattress for us. Will definitely shop with them again!
